event.title: will be held in H. L. Snyder Funeral Home, Inc., Friday, March 27, 2009

data.event: Funeral services will be held in H. L. Snyder Funeral Home, Inc., Friday, March 27, 2009 at 11:00 A.M. with the Rev. Richard Fritts officiating.
Friends will be received Thursday, March 26, from 7:00 P.M. until 9:00 P.M. at the at the H. L. Snyder Funeral Home, Inc., Pine Grove.
